data.text:
『The excitement from the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe still hasn't 
died down, but we're getting surprising news!』
data.name: Voice from Smartphone
data.processed:
<story>『The excitement from the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe still hasn't 
<story>died down, but we're getting surprising news!』

data.text:
『The strongest Uma Musume has decided to enter the Japan Cup, 
among those involved, it caused quite an uproar!』
data.name: Voice from Smartphone
data.processed:
<story>『The strongest Uma Musume has decided to enter the Japan Cup, 
<story>among those involved, it caused quite an uproar!』

data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: Grass～! It's been a while!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Grass～! It's been a while!

data.text:
Welcome back, El. 
Seems like this room will be getting noisy again～
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Welcome back, El. 
<story>Seems like this room will be getting noisy again～

data.text: Wow! It's been a while since I've heard such sharp words too!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Wow! It's been a while since I've heard such sharp words too!

data.text:
I need to quickly get used to Japan again, huh!? 
At any rate, it's been half a year since we've talked!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>I need to quickly get used to Japan again, huh!? 
<story>At any rate, it's been half a year since we've talked!

data.text:
That's right～, jet lag changing when you eat meals, oh and 
studying, there's a lot of things you need to do to get back to 
your normal life, huh～?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>That's right～, jet lag changing when you eat meals, oh and 
<story>studying, there's a lot of things you need to do to get back to 
<story>your normal life, huh～?

data.text:
Nuaaaa～～! Particularly when it comes to studying, 
I don't want to face that reality!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Nuaaaa～～! Particularly when it comes to studying, 
<story>I don't want to face that reality!

data.text:
……Oh and then, you need to quickly get used to Japan's courses 
again. After all, you promised to run together with us again.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>……Oh and then, you need to quickly get used to Japan's courses 
<story>again. After all, you promised to run together with us again.

data.text:
Ehehee, it was supposed to be after I became the world's 
strongest but ……I guess that's changed a little bit, huh……?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Ehehee, it was supposed to be after I became the world's 
<story>strongest but ……I guess that's changed a little bit, huh……?

data.text: ……Ehehe……
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>……Ehehe……

data.text:
……El, whatever you think about those results, 
to me the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 was your best race.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>……El, whatever you think about those results, 
<story>to me the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 was your best race.

data.text:
Compared to the El who ran on that big stage, nothing has 
changed…… you're a rival that helped me stand on my own two feet, 
and someone I look up to.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Compared to the El who ran on that big stage, nothing has 
<story>changed…… you're a rival that helped me stand on my own two feet, 
<story>and someone I look up to.

data.text:
That's why I'm so motivated for this 『Japan Cup』. 
It's a good opportunity to reach for the top, and besides that―
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>That's why I'm so motivated for this 『Japan Cup』. 
<story>It's a good opportunity to reach for the top, and besides that―

data.text:
For us Japanese Uma Musume that have run together 
with El, it's a chance to engrave our strength 
in to the hearts of those from overseas.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>For us Japanese Uma Musume that have run together 
<story>with El, it's a chance to engrave our strength 
<story>in to the hearts of those from overseas.

data.text: ……Grass
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>……Grass

data.text:
……Ehehee……go show them! 
The strength of the rivals that ran together with me!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>……Ehehee……go show them! 
<story>The strength of the rivals that ran together with me!

data.text: In the 『Fall Tenno Sho』, Special Week was able to claim victory.
data.processed: <story>In the 『Fall Tenno Sho』, Special Week was able to claim victory.

data.text:
While training for the next race, the 『Japan Cup』, 
a particular piece of news had made it to Japan.
data.processed:
<story>While training for the next race, the 『Japan Cup』, 
<story>a particular piece of news had made it to Japan.

data.text:
『On this show, we'll be covering the 
interview with her, please stay tuned』
data.name: Voice from TV
data.processed:
<story>『On this show, we'll be covering the 
<story>interview with her, please stay tuned』

data.text: Hey, it's starting!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Hey, it's starting!

data.text: About the decision to visit Japan, will you please tell us more!?
data.name: Interviewer
data.processed: <story>About the decision to visit Japan, will you please tell us more!?

data.text: Yes, with pleasure.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story>Yes, with pleasure.

data.text:
All across the world, various races are taking place. 
And I have conquered that peak.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed:
<story>All across the world, various races are taking place. 
<story>And I have conquered that peak.

data.text:
However, in this world, I've learned that 
there are still many talented Uma Musume.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed:
<story>However, in this world, I've learned that 
<story>there are still many talented Uma Musume.

data.text:
Suddenly my interest was piqued……that there exist 
many such talents. And of the strength of the Uma 
Musume running in Japan's Twinkle Series.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed:
<story>Suddenly my interest was piqued……that there exist 
<story>many such talents. And of the strength of the Uma 
<story>Musume running in Japan's Twinkle Series.

data.text:
The one that got me fired up, El Condor Pasa, 
and her contemporaries, Grass Wonder and Special Week.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed:
<story>The one that got me fired up, El Condor Pasa, 
<story>and her contemporaries, Grass Wonder and Special Week.

data.text:
Both of whom plan to participate in the 『Japan Cup』, 
I shall also be participating.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed:
<story>Both of whom plan to participate in the 『Japan Cup』, 
<story>I shall also be participating.

data.text: <I'm looking forward to it>
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story><I'm looking forward to it>

data.text:
To think the winner of the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 would 
participate herself.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>To think the winner of the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 would 
<story>participate herself.

data.text: She mentioned Spe-san by name too……
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>She mentioned Spe-san by name too……

data.text:
『And moving on, the news of Montjeu's participation, 
let's hear the reaction of the fans』
data.name: Voice from TV
data.processed:
<story>『And moving on, the news of Montjeu's participation, 
<story>let's hear the reaction of the fans』

data.text:
『Her battle against El Condor Pasa was amazing, wasn't it!? 
That Japan's Uma Musume were this strong, it really had me excited!』
data.name: Voice from TV
data.processed:
<story>『Her battle against El Condor Pasa was amazing, wasn't it!? 
<story>That Japan's Uma Musume were this strong, it really had me excited!』

data.text:
『But even so, it was still unfortunate……! 
That's why, I want Japan's Uma Musume to do their best!]』
data.name: Voice from TV
data.processed:
<story>『But even so, it was still unfortunate……! 
<story>That's why, I want Japan's Uma Musume to do their best!]』

data.text:
『Special Week-san, and Grass Wonder-san― as Japan's Uma Musume, 
we'll be cheering for you with all we've got!』
data.name: Voice from TV
data.processed:
<story>『Special Week-san, and Grass Wonder-san― as Japan's Uma Musume, 
<story>we'll be cheering for you with all we've got!』

data.text:
『As expected, there are many fans that want revenge 
against the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe Uma Musume, 
and have high hopes for Japan's Uma Musume』
data.name: Voice from TV
data.processed:
<story>『As expected, there are many fans that want revenge 
<story>against the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe Uma Musume, 
<story>and have high hopes for Japan's Uma Musume』

data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text:
By preventing El Condor Pasa's victory, 
many of Japan's fans had come to know the name Montjeu.
data.processed:
<story>By preventing El Condor Pasa's victory, 
<story>many of Japan's fans had come to know the name Montjeu.

data.text:
At the news of the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe 
Uma Musume's participation, Special Week remained 
calm, watching without looking away.
data.processed:
<story>At the news of the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe 
<story>Uma Musume's participation, Special Week remained 
<story>calm, watching without looking away.

data.text: We'll need to train harder, Spe.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>We'll need to train harder, Spe.

data.text: We'll need to train harder, Spe.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>We'll need to train harder, Spe.

data.text: Yeah!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah!!

data.text:
And like that, talk of the 『Japan Cup』 heated up all throughout Japan, 
but then there was sudden news.
data.processed:
<story>And like that, talk of the 『Japan Cup』 heated up all throughout Japan, 
<story>but then there was sudden news.

data.text: ――Grass Wonder, was withdrawing from the 『Japan Cup』.
data.processed: <story>――Grass Wonder, was withdrawing from the 『Japan Cup』.

data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: Grass-chan……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Grass-chan……

data.text:
Oh, the sky is already turning red…… 
Winter is right around the corner, huh～?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Oh, the sky is already turning red…… 
<story>Winter is right around the corner, huh～?

data.text: Um……well……about the 『Japan Cup』……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Um……well……about the 『Japan Cup』……

data.text: I suppose I worked a little bit too hard during training.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>I suppose I worked a little bit too hard during training.

data.text:
With everyone in Japan talking about it, it became a race on the 
path to the summit. Running with the opponent that beat El, it 
was an unbelievable opportunity.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>With everyone in Japan talking about it, it became a race on the 
<story>path to the summit. Running with the opponent that beat El, it 
<story>was an unbelievable opportunity.

data.text:
A way to respond to the fans that wanted Japan's 
Uma Musume to win, and as a representative of 
Japan's Uma Musume, I wanted to run.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>A way to respond to the fans that wanted Japan's 
<story>Uma Musume to win, and as a representative of 
<story>Japan's Uma Musume, I wanted to run.

data.text: ……and together with Spe-chan
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>……and together with Spe-chan

data.text: Me……?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Me……?

data.text: At the 『Fall Tenno Sho』, your running was truly wonderful.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>At the 『Fall Tenno Sho』, your running was truly wonderful.

data.text:
That's why I was looking forward to running with Spe-chan. 
Once again running together……I was really……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>That's why I was looking forward to running with Spe-chan. 
<story>Once again running together……I was really……

data.text: I really…… wanted to run……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>I really…… wanted to run……

data.text: Grass-chan……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Grass-chan……

data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: ……Um, listen, Grass-chan.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>……Um, listen, Grass-chan.

data.text: I'm going to win.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>I'm going to win.

data.text: ……eh?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>……eh?

data.text: I wanted to run with Grass-chan too.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>I wanted to run with Grass-chan too.

data.text:
And I wanted to win against Montjeu-san and Grass-chan. 
Because I still haven't won against Grass-chan.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>And I wanted to win against Montjeu-san and Grass-chan. 
<story>Because I still haven't won against Grass-chan.

data.text:
That's why I'll win. I― Special Week will 
prove that I am Japan's strongest Uma Musume.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>That's why I'll win. I― Special Week will 
<story>prove that I am Japan's strongest Uma Musume.

data.text:
And at the 『Arima Kinen』, I'll be waiting for you! 
As Japan's #1 Uma Musume!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>And at the 『Arima Kinen』, I'll be waiting for you! 
<story>As Japan's #1 Uma Musume!

data.text: Spe-chan……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Spe-chan……

data.text:
Fufuu, then I'll need to recover from this injury by then, 
I need to be in top condition for that, don't I?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu, then I'll need to recover from this injury by then, 
<story>I need to be in top condition for that, don't I?

data.text: Yeah!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah!

data.text:
In the 『Japan Cup』, do your best out there. The strength of 
Japan's Uma Musume, make sure you show the whole world.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>In the 『Japan Cup』, do your best out there. The strength of 
<story>Japan's Uma Musume, make sure you show the whole world.

data.text: I have high hopes for you, "Supreme Commander of Japan"
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>I have high hopes for you, "Supreme Commander of Japan"
